Name: Mana Tornado
Desc:
Utilize the Circle of Mana to create a tornado out of mana to attack the enemy. Can be used during Circle of Mana IV and VI.
Only 1 Mana Tornado can exist at a time and does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
Use a custom command to cast Circle of Mana again with the Down key after the first hit of Circle of Mana IV or VI.
Custom Command On/Off: Right-click
Required skill: Lv. 30 Circle of Mana IV or higher
